titles.title: Neighborhood Investment Act of 2009
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to exclude certain gains on single-family residential rental property from gross income.
Neighborhood Investment Act of 2009

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: Neighborhood Investment Act of 2009 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to exclude from gross income gain from the sale of single-family residential rental property held by a taxpayer for two years or more and rented as a single dwelling unit on a regular basis during the five-year period prior to its sale. Limits the amount of such exclusion to $250,000.
